subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Which goddess is considered the Kuldevi of the Rajputs?
explanation_en: Mata Savitri is considered the Kuldevi of the Rajputs.
explanation_hi: माता सावित्री राजपूतों की कुलदेवी मानी जाती है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Who is the presiding deity of the Marwar region?
question_hi: मारवाड़ क्षेत्र का प्रमुख देवता कौन है?
explanation_en: Durga Mata is the presiding deity of the Marwar region.
explanation_hi: दुर्गा माता मारवाड़ क्षेत्र की प्रमुख देवी है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Which goddess is worshipped as the Kuldevi of the Jats?
explanation_en: Mata Gangaur is worshipped as the Kuldevi of the Jats.
explanation_hi: माता गंगौर जाटों की कुलदेवी मानी जाती है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Which deity is associated with the city of Ajmer?
question_hi: अजमेर शहर से जुड़ा देवता कौन है?
explanation_en: Khatushyamji is the deity associated with the city of Ajmer.
explanation_hi: खatushyamji अजमेर शहर से जुड़ा हुआ है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Who is the presiding deity of the Sodha Rajputs?
question_hi: सोहड़ा राजपूतों का प्रमुख देवता कौन है?
explanation_en: Durga Mata is the presiding deity of the Sodha Rajputs.
explanation_hi: दुर्गा माता सोहड़ा राजपूतों की प्रमुख देवी है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Which goddess is considered the Kuldevi of the Bhati Rajputs?
question_hi: भाटी राजपूतों की कुलदेवी कौन है?
explanation_en: Mata Karni Mata is considered the Kuldevi of the Bhati Rajputs.
explanation_hi: माता करणी माता भाटी राजपूतों की कुलदेवी मानी जाती है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Who is the presiding deity of the Jangladesh region?
question_hi: जांगलदेश क्षेत्र का प्रमुख देवता कौन है?
explanation_en: Mata Hinglaj is the presiding deity of the Jangladesh region.
explanation_hi: माता हिंगलाज जांगलदेश क्षेत्र की प्रमुख देवी है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Which goddess is worshipped as the Kuldevi of the Charan community?
question_hi: चारण समुदाय की कुलदेवी कौन है?
explanation_en: Mata Savitri is worshipped as the Kuldevi of the Charan community.
explanation_hi: माता सावित्री चारण समुदाय की कुलदेवी मानी जाती है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Which deity is associated with the city of Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर शहर से जुड़ा देवता कौन है?
explanation_en: Mata Chamunda is the deity associated with the city of Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: माता चामुण्डा जोधपुर शहर से जुड़ी है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
topic: Rajasthan ki Lok Deviyan: Kuldevi aur Aaradhya Deviyan
question_en: Who is the presiding deity of the Paliwal Brahmins?
question_hi: पालीवाल ब्राह्मणों का प्रमुख देवता कौन है?
explanation_en: Mata Shakti is the presiding deity of the Paliwal Brahmins.
explanation_hi: माता शक्ति पालीवाल ब्राह्मणों की प्रमुख देवी है।
